Getting Started¶

System Requirements & Installation¶

  • Python 2.7
  • The whole pipeline was designed and tested on Linux systems (CentOS, Arch)
  • SyConn is based on the packages ELEKTRONN, Knossos Python-Tools
  • KNOSSOS is used for visualization and annotation of 3D EM data sets.

For installation instructions see installation. We recommend using Anaconda as python distribution.

An code example can be found in section examples
